Sequence Information.Peptide Name: LL-37mini1 (KR-8+, W542, Synthetic AMPs, LL-37 derived, Trp-rich; XXA, UCLL1c)
Sequence Information.Source: human cathelicidin analog, animal-derived, natural derivative

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is most similar (87.5%) toD3-HN2. W: 50%; K: 25%. GRAVY: -2.425; M Wt: 1303.526; M formula: C67H90N18O10, mol ex coeff: 22200. This is a unique sequence and more resembles LL-37.Activity: Active against E. coli (MIC 4 uM), S. aureus USA300 (MIC 8 uM), P. aeruginosa (MIC 4-8 uM), K-pneumoniae (MIC>32 uM), and A. baumannii (MIC 32 uM) in MHB.Toxicity: human RBC: HC50 >>200 uM, not hemo.lytic.  Name updated 9/2024
Literature Information.Author: Mechesso AF, Su Y, Xie J, Wang G. 2023
Literature Information.Title: Enhanced Antimicrobial Screening Sensitivity Enabled the Identification of an Ultrashort Peptide KR-8 for Engineering of LL-37mini to Combat Drug-Resistant Pathogens
